item.title: Glitchly skillcapes?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey. I have added these codes:

case 0: // Attack levelup sendFrame164(6247); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a attack level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[0] >= 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your attack level!!"); addItem(10705,1); addItem(10706,1); } break; case 1: // Strength sendFrame164(6206); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level!", 6207); sendFrame126("Your strength level is now "+playerLevel[2]+" .", 6208); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[1] >= 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your strength level!!"); addItem(10708,1); addItem(10709,1); } break; case 2: // Defence sendFrame164(6253); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[2] >= 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your defence level!!"); addItem(10711,1); addItem(10712,1); } break; case 3: //Hitpoints sendFrame164(6216); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level!", 6217); sendFrame126("Your hitpoints level is now "+playerLevel[3]+" .", 6218); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[3] >= 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your hitpoints level!!"); addItem(10713,1); addItem(10714,1); } break; case 4: //Ranging sendFrame164(4443); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a ranged level!", 4444); sendFrame126("Your ranged level is now "+playerLevel[4]+" .", 4445); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a ranging level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[4] >= 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your ranged level!!"); addItem(10715,1); addItem(10716,1); } break; case 5: // Prayer sendFrame164(6242); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a prayer level!", 6243); sendFrame126("Your prayer level is now "+playerLevel[5]+" .", 6244); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a prayer level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[5] >= 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your prayer level!!"); addItem(10718,1); addItem(10719,1); } break; case 6: // Magic sendFrame164(6211); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a magic level!", 6212); sendFrame126("Your magic level is now "+playerLevel[6]+" .", 6213); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a magic level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[6] >= 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your magic level!!"); addItem(10720,1); addItem(10721,1); } break; case 7: //Cooking sendFrame164(6226); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a cooking level!", 6227); sendFrame126("Your cooking level is now "+playerLevel[7]+" .", 6228); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a cooking level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[7] >= 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your cooking level!!"); addItem(10759,1); addItem(10760,1); } break; case 8: //Woodcutting sendFrame164(4272); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a woodcutting level!", 4273); sendFrame126("Your woodcutitng level is now "+playerLevel[8]+" .", 4274); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a woodcutting level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[8] >= 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your woodcutting level!!"); addItem(10765,1); addItem(10766,1); } break; case 9: //Fletching sendFrame164(6231); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a fletching level!", 6232); sendFrame126("Your fletching level is now "+playerLevel[9]+" .", 6233); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a fletching level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[9] == 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on maxing out your fletching level!!"); addItem(10741,1); addItem(10742,1); }

But alot of them are glitchy, like it doesn’t really give out the skillcapes on some of them but then some of them it does, and also, the range one, it shows the range lv up thing when you lv right? Well it says Line1 and Line 2 where the congratulations and stuff are suppose the be…

Read full topic
